pkgmetadata.longdescription: This is a header file suitable for sourcing in scripts to make available useful functions. The basic script header is build to work in an austere [ash] shell environment (like busybox). The extended header provides more robust [bash] functions including support for command line argument processing and command sequence execution; a template/example script and example local cmdline arg/useage extension modules are provided as well. The "niopt" header turns off irritating colorized outputs if the shell is not interactive. Run summarize_me and summarize_my_extension to have the package itself provide more info.

use.flag: Generate the header supporting an extended set of (bash) functions
Generate checkshell()/de-colorization header for non-interactive shells
Install a template/example script empoloying the extended [bash] header
